name: La Espada Sagrada
storyline: According to legend, a brave warrior "Mahua" managed, after overcoming tough tests and facing the fierce warriors of the town "Poloruwa", unearthing the Sacred Sword during the full moon so that it acquired all its power. Otherwise, the benign power of the Sacred Sword would be transformed into negative energy, a source of power that in the hands of the "Poloruwas" could be used to subdue any people to their will.
summary:
"La Espada Sagrada" is an action adventure game consisting of three levels. where our protagonist aspires to obtain the Sacred Sword.

The first two stages are more oriented towards adventure, platforming and puzzle solving , while crossing a dangerous jungle and a cave full of traps.

In the third and final stage, our hero takes advantage of the sword to rise victorious in a classic action arcade side-scrolling gameplay.
